definitions.title: Qal 4
definitions.body: ;—´[[ע]] Le 26:36 +; cstr. [[עֲלֵה]] Ge 3:7, Ge 8:11; sf. [[עָלֵהוּ]] Je 17:8 +; pl. cstr. [[עֲלֵי]] Ne 8:15 +; sf. [[עֶלֶהָ]] Is 1:30; —leaf, leafage, of various trees Ge 3:7, Ge 8:11, Ne 8:15, Ne 8:15, Ne 8:15, Ne 8:15, Ne 8:15; green Je 17:8, flourishing Pr 11:28; but usu. fading Is 1:30, Is 34:4, Is 64:5, Je 8:13, Ez Eze 47:12, Ps 1:3; driven leaf Le 26:36, Job 13:25; [[עלה לִתְרוּפָה]] leaf for healing Ez Eze 47:12.
